messages.message:
Hey Team, could someone confirm if this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/69450) introduced the change of setting app_ids as query params rather than name? I was wondering if it has anything thing to do with the report we got from PG about accuracy load failing on aihub. They say it was working last week. Checking on the requests, we noticed these two endpoints breaking with too long request:
```api/v2/ground-truth-sets/list
/api/v2/ground-truth-sets/accuracy-runs```
@pauline.comising @Serena
